CWEs: CWE-601: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
description: The function unique_name_489 is vulnerable to URL redirection attacks. In the onSuccess function, it redirects the user to a URL specified in req.query.from without properly validating or sanitizing the URL. This could allow an attacker to craft a URL that redirects a user to an arbitrary website, potentially for phishing or other malicious purposes.
